name: Three Travelling Triplets
description:
2D project developed by 1st year students of the Games Development course (2020/2021).

Developed by:

  • Bernardo Boffa-Molinar
  • Henrique Madruga
  • Pedro Mourinha

Controls:

  • A or Left Arrow - Controlled triplet walk to the left
  • D or Right Arrow - Controlled triplet walk to the right
  • W or Up Arrow - Controlled triplet jumps
  • 1 - Take control triplet Oni
  • 2 - Take control triplet Dio
  • 3 - Take control triplet Tria
  • Tab - Cycle through controlled triplets
  • Space - Activate/Deactivate controlled triplet ability
  • Escape - Pause/Unpause Game

For more information about the university and the Games Development B.Sc., visit this link: https://www.iade.europeia.pt/en/courses/undergraduate/global-bachelor/games-deve...
